H0.text: Hans Langsdorff commanded which pocket battleship in WWII. Admiral Graf

H1.text: Hans Langsdorff commanded which pocket battleship in WWII. Deutschland

H2.text: Hans Langsdorff commanded which pocket battleship in WWII. Admiral Scheer

H3.text: Hans Langsdorff commanded which pocket battleship in WWII. Graf Spee

A4.text: Hans Wilhelm Langsdorff ... most famous for his command of the German pocket battleship Admiral Graf Spee before and during the Battle of the River Plate

A5.text: He received command of the Admiral Graf Spee in October 1938
